Summary: 4 then 6 2hen 10 lights splitting apart moving at least five thousand feet in a tenth of a second then stoping, then going back. All in a second.
divs: Sighting DetailsSaw first for them six them ten lights in formation flying give thousand feet in tenth of a second at times, other times hovering, splitting up, rejoining in a blink, flying loop the loops, blinking red and green some of them, mostly white though. From 9 ten to 945pm est. Flying south from greenfield area of sky across town due north, observed from middle of frick park, flew.straight over the widest part of the city north out of site. No joke, one hundred percent real. About to go reevaluaate what I want from life.
Object Flight Path: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
